pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast and Robust Deconvolution of Tumor Infiltrating Lymphocyte from Expression Profiles using Least Trimmed Squares // Using the idea of least trimmed square, it could automatically detects and removes outliers from data before estimating the coefficients. It is a robust machine learning tool which can be applied to gene-expression deconvolution technique. Yuning Hao, Ming Yan, Blake R. Heath, Yu L. Lei and Yuying Xie (2019) doi:10.1101/358366.
